name: Checkout
options: Customers can checkout their baskets securely. With SSL (https) and Stripe Hosted Elements, our implementation is compliant with the 'PCI DSS Self-Assessment Questionnaire A (SAQ A)'.

name: Sign Up & Login
options: Users can create accounts on your website using either 1 of 1 or 1 of 2 methods available: Facebook, Amazon, Twitter, Google, Email Address, Username and *Phone Number (*extra charges for sms verification).

name: View Receipts & Orders placed
options: Account holders can monitor their orders and also view receipts of completed purchases.

name: Save Checkout Details
options: Account holders can ease the checkout flow by pre-filling checkout details. Users can save and edit their Name, Address, Contact Phone, Contact email etc. Stripe Payments offers storage of customer payment details.
